channel.title: How to get around this?
channel.description:
I know, you guys are far more advanced in this stuff.. I'm just kinda messing around
I get this message after I try running my own RS: Error_game_invalidhost - Incorrect website. This game does not appear to be loading from the correct website.
Please make sure you are playing from: http://www.runescape.com
Remember to keep your account secure NEVER enter your password anywhere except runescape.com.
There a way to get around this? I'm assuming I'd have to edit around in the loader.jar's, what exactly should I edit?

item.title: How to get around this?
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

look for getDocumentBase()

i think the method which checks is in the Applet_Sub class, but dont quote me on that.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get around this?
item.dc:creator: @shangtsung1 shangtsung1
item.description:
@shangtsung1 wrote:

umm in the one of the java files there should be " if(host.equals(“jagex.com”)){}"
would be the place to look

Read full topic
